front.name: Scratched & Scuffed
front.description.1: Anything can happen in production — sometimes we end up with a perfectly functional item that just has a cosmetic flaw.
front.description.2: Usually it’s about the finish — chipped anodizing or some noticeable scratches. Occasionally the laser engraving might go a bit off. We also include items used for photoshoots or short test rides here.
front.description.3: You can get these products at a discounted price.
